name: 1337-ext
description: A zero dependency chrome extension for enhancing user experience on 1337x torrent sites

scripts.dev: (rm -rf dist || true) && parcel watch src/background.ts src/content.ts
scripts.build: (rm -rf dist || true) && parcel build --no-source-maps src/background.ts src/content.ts
scripts.zip: (rm -rf *.zip || true) && npm run build && bestzip build.zip dist/* icon* manifest.json

author: rishav394
